Name: Offering Table with a Small Square Basin
Description: The roughly made offering tray has offerings modeled in the shape of round and conical loaves of bread, the horn of an ox, the head of a bird, and a jug of beer. According to ancient Egyptian beliefs, these food models would be transformed magically into real food offerings in the afterlife. The tray also has a small square basin. The funerary priest would pour water, wine, or milk into the basin for the deceased.
